english_translation: Narrated from Ali: Regarding a man who divorces his wife once or twice, then another man marries her and consummated the marriage, then she returns to the first one. He said: 'She is with him upon what remains of the divorce. The second marriage does not nullify the one or two (divorces), but it nullifies three.'
